homeHeader.title: From Licensing to Launch, Accelerate Your Market Entry & Maximize Profits With One Nexuz Dubai Mainland Company Formation Services
homeHeader.description: From selecting the right license and business structure to handling government approvals, visas, and compliance, One Nexuz streamlines every step of your Dubai mainland setup so you can focus on growth, not red tape. Whether you’re launching a new venture or expanding into Dubai’s thriving economy, our all-in-one business setup solution puts licensing, structuring, and expert guidance in one seamless process—helping you start faster and scale with confidence.

leftSection_1.title: Why Set Up Your Business in the Dubai Mainland

items.subTitle: From Local Deals to Global Exports — Enjoy Seamless Trade Opportunities & Scale Freely

items.title: Own 100% of Your Dubai Mainland Business Without Local Sponsor Dependency
items.subTitle: Own 100% of Your Dubai Mainland Business Without Local Sponsor Dependency
items.description: Losing equity and control to local sponsors can hold back your ambitions. Skip the hassle of partnering with a local sponsor and enjoy full foreign ownership of your business. Hire, expand, and thrive anywhere in Dubai, with zero hassle. Protect your profits and retain complete independence as you grow.

leftSection_3.title: Types of Company Formation in the Dubai Mainland
leftSection_3.description: Abu Dhabi Free Zones boast countless company structures to meet your long-term business goals, including:

items.title: Limited Liability Company
items.description: LLCs offer unparalleled flexibility, 1-50 shareholders, and 100% foreign ownership, making them ideal for startups and SMEs.

items.title: Sole Proprietorship
items.description: Ideal for solopreneurs, these offer professionals complete control over their business. The downside? Unlimited liability.

items.title: Civil Company
items.description: Suited for professional services such as law firms and healthcare, these allow partners to gain full ownership.

items.title: Limited Partnership
items.description: For UAE nationals, limited partnerships comprise general partners who are liable only to the extent of their professional contributions.

items.title: Branch of a Foreign Company
items.description: Dubai mainland allows foreign businesses to set up subsidiaries within the area to expand their reach.

items.title: Free Zone Company Branch
items.description: Perfect for Free Zone companies seeking expansion, FZC empowers businesses to navigate regulatory requirements.

sec1.title: Turn 1.5 Billion Dubai Mainland Consumers into Your Customers with Our Experts
sec1.description: Tap into booming trade routes across Africa, West Asia, and Europe. We set up your business where it counts at the global crossroads of growth.

sec2.title: Compare Our Dubai Mainland Company Formation Costs
sec2.description: At One Nexuz, we create tailored quotes based on your exact requirements—license type, visas, office space, and more. You get a clear breakdown, pay only for what’s essential, and keep more capital free to grow your business.

leftSection_5.title: How We Set Up Your Company in the Dubai Mainland

items.title: Identify Your Business Activities
items.description: Our expert consultants guide you in selecting the most suitable business activities, ensuring you apply for the correct license category and remain fully compliant with Dubai Mainland regulations.

items.title: Select the Company Formation Structure
items.description: We help you choose the right legal entity—LLC, branch, or sole establishment—and secure your trade name, aligning everything with your long-term business goals.

items.title: Compile the Necessary Documents
items.description: Enjoy a smooth, hassle-free setup while our team prepares, collects, and submits all required paperwork to the Dubai Department of Economic Development (DED) and other relevant authorities.

items.title: Secure Your Office Space
items.description: Meet the mandatory Mainland workspace requirements with our assistance in selecting the ideal location. We’ll help you arrange a cost-effective office solution and finalise your Memorandum of Association (MOA) or appoint a local sponsor.

items.title: Receive Your License
items.description: Once your application is approved, we secure your trade license based on your chosen activities, enabling you to officially begin operations in Dubai.

items.title: Register & Open Your Bank Account
items.description: Post-licensing, our PRO agents assist with VAT registration under the Federal Tax Authority (FTA) and guide you in opening a reliable corporate bank account, ensuring smooth financial operations from day one.

leftSection_6.title: Why Businesses Choose One Nexuz for Mainland Company Setup in Dubai?
leftSection_6.description: Handling mainland setup on your own can mean costly delays, rejected paperwork, and endless back-and-forth. But with professionals by your side, you can launch faster and grow with full confidence.

items.title: Secure Your License within Days
items.description: Our business consultants work closely with the DED to expedite approvals, empowering you to set up and start operating within 3-5 business days.

items.title: Receive Custom-Tailored Solutions
items.description: Our expert consultants help you choose from 2000+ business activities to match you with the perfect legal structure and license, streamlining the setup process.

items.title: Get End-to-End Services Under One Roof
items.description: From business licensing to securing visas and leasing office space, our certified consultants handle it all, so you won’t have to juggle multiple providers.

leftSection_7.title: Partner with One Nexuz For Professional Mainland License Services & Operate Anywhere in the UAE
leftSection_7.description: Unlike free zone companies, mainland entities can operate across the UAE, giving you maximum flexibility, client access, and scaling freedom.

faq.title: Clear Answers, Expert Insights, Hassle Free Consulting Experience

items.question: How does a mainland company differ from a free zone company?
items.answer: A mainland company in Dubai offers users unrestricted trading access across the city, as well as property ownership in these areas. In contrast, free zone companies operate in designated free zones, providing a tax-free environment.

items.question: Can expats own 100% of their mainland business in Dubai?
items.answer: Yes, foreign investors can enjoy 100% ownership of a mainland company in Dubai, ensuring complete control over their business.

items.question: Can my mainland company operate internationally?
items.answer: Yes, Dubai mainland companies can operate throughout the UAE and globally without restrictions.

items.question: Do I need a physical office space to set up a Dubai mainland company?
items.answer: Yes, mainland companies in Dubai are required to own a physical office space. Our expert consultants can help you find a cost-effective office solution to ensure compliance.

items.question: Can One Nexuz help me set up a corporate bank account?
items.answer: Absolutely! Our experts connect you with the ideal bank partner to help streamline your personal and business finances.
